news.title: MMI and Gnosis Safe: A Partnership Made in DAO Heaven
news.subtitle: A key feature that makes Gnosis Safe the self-custody wallet of choice for DAOs is its multi-sig feature, which provides additional security for DAOs to deploy funds.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
In March 2022, Metamask Institutional (MMI) announced an integration with several qualified custodians and custody technology providers, including Gnosis Safe, a leading digital asset management platform on Ethereum. With this partnership, MMI expands its cryptocurrency custody offerings to integrate custody options for Web3-native organizations such as decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs).

Gnosis Safe is one of the most popular digital asset management platforms for DAOs, with over $90B worth of assets stored in self custody. Many DAOs, including Uniswap, Maker DAO, Aave, and Bit DAO use Gnosis Safe for their custody needs.

DAOs prefer Gnosis Safe for its multi-sig security feature, which provides them with additional security to deploy funds. Using this feature, DAOs can ensure that multiple stakeholders sign off on a transaction before funds are released.

Let‚Äôs take a deeper look into Gnosis‚Äô multi-sig security, and why DAOs need it.

DAOs and their Unique Custody Needs

A DAO is a community-led organization that is designed to decentralize control. There is no central decision-making authority, and all important matters are decided on by all members of the DAO.

Individual DAO members create a proposal such as those related to functioning, treasury allocations, even the future of the DAO. All members of the DAO can then vote on these proposals using their governance tokens. When a pre-decided consensus is reached on a proposal, then it is accepted and enforced by the rules coded within a smart contract.

Since there is no central authority that is signing off on decisions, DAOs require multiple members to be signatories to their transactions. This is imperative to maintain the decentralization that is core to the structure of DAOs. This is where Gnosis Safe‚Äôs multi-sig feature is best suited for DAOs to manage their crypto transactions since it requires multiple members to confirm the transaction before it is executed. This adds an extra layer of security to the DAO treasury and prevents unauthorized use of DAO funds.

MMI and Gnosis Safe Give DAOs Unrivaled Access to DeFi

Currently, DAOs can use Gnosis Safe to manage their funds in two ways. First, they can transact directly with the Gnosis Safe wallet and their ecosystem of apps called Safe apps. Second, they can connect their wallet of choice with Gnosis Safe using WalletConnect. To do so, they have to scan a QR code to connect WalletConnect with the dapp they wish to use. This process is cumbersome, and also limits the DAOs access to the DeFi ecosystem to the dapps and protocols that WalletConnect supports.

With MMI‚Äôs partnership with Gnosis, DAOs have a third, more convenient way to connect with DeFi. This gives them unrivaled access to the DeFi ecosystem because MMI connects to over 17,000 dapps. MMI also allows DAOs to join MetaMask‚Äôs 20M monthly active users across the globe in accessing Web3. In addition, with MMI‚Äôs DeFi and Web3 portfolio dashboard, DAOs can get a holistic overview of their portfolio, its performance, individual assets, and historical transactions.

‚ÄúGnosis Safe is a foundational cornerstone of our ecosystem‚Äîan unmatched and trusted platform on which most DAOs rely to secure and manage their digital assets. This integration, therefore, brings together these two important elements

for organisations; unrivaled access and trusted security. We are, therefore, thrilled by this partnership and the further collaboration between Gnosis Safe and ConsenSys,‚Äù says Johann Bornman, Global Product Lead for MMI.

MMI and Decentralization

The partnership between MMI and Gnosis Safe also strengthens ConsenSys‚Äô commitment towards Web3-native organizations, and towards Ethereum‚Äôs goal of decentralization.

A decentralized web is a cornerstone of ConsenSys‚Äô product philosophy. For example, the company has been enabling wider participation in ecosystem governance through DAO creation and participation. There currently are three DAOs ‚Äì Village DAO, Education DAO, and Sandbox DAO ‚Äì that are powered by ConsenSys.

Furthermore, ConsenSys promotes decentralization through its products. Metamask is the first wallet to offer extensibility to users, with Metamask Flask. Flask is a proving ground for developers to roll out experimental features in Metamask. The first feature to be released through Flask was Snaps, which allows developers to expand the functionality of Metamask at runtime, without any involvement from us. Snaps is poised to accelerate the rate of innovation not just in Ethereum, but the entire Web3 ecosystem.

MMI and its Custody Offerings

MMI‚Äôs Gnosis integration comes as part of its expansion of custody solutions to cater to the needs of a wide range of organizations, across different geographies and with different tech stack requirements.

MMI has partnered with Hex Trust to expand its institutional-grade custody offerings into Asia-Pacific and Europe, Middle East, and Asia. Its partnership with Parfin brings its custody features to banks, exchanges, family offices and hedge funds in Latin America. Meanwhile, MMI‚Äôs has also partnered with GK8 to bring general support for any Ethereum Virtual Machine-compatible layer-1 networks as well as instant integrations with level-2 protocols.

The latest partnerships build on MMI‚Äôs previous integrations with BitGo, Qredo, and Cactus Custody.

Get in Touch with MetaMask Institutional

nodes.title: How to sell crypto for cash
nodes.subtitle: Discover the ways MetaMask makes selling crypto easy, quick, and safe.

image.title: How to sell crypto with MetaMask
image.description: MetaMask makes selling cryptocurrencies fast, easy, and secure. With low fees and seamless off-ramping.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Selling crypto for cash is as simple as can be with MetaMask. You can exchange crypto from MetaMask wallet directly to your debit card, credit card, PayPal, or bank account. No unnecessary steps, no excess fees, no worries.

Below, we'll give you an overview of how we make MetaMask wallet powerful, secure, and configurable when you sell cryptocurrencies. Then, you'll find videos and step-by-step guides showing you exactly how to sell crypto with MetaMask on your browser or mobile app.

Let's get into it! ü¶ä

How MetaMask empowers you when selling crypto

  • Sell directly from your wallet, and send cash to the place that works for you.
  • Choose the best quote for selling crypto, curated from our industry-leading providers.
  • Avoid centralized exchanges, extra steps, and additional costs.
  • Select your country and choose from a range of available payment methods.
  • Buy crypto, use crypto, and sell crypto. All in one place.

How MetaMask wallet keeps you secure when selling crypto

  • Get 24/7 help whenever you need it from our expert customer service team.
    • We only work with trusted providers, ensuring that they comply with applicable regulations and are legitimate, responsible parties.
  • Preserving your privacy is paramount: MetaMask does not store ‚Äî nor do we have access to ‚Äî any personal information you provide when buying or selling crypto, such as payment details, personal data, or email addresses.
  • Unlike a centralized exchange, neither MetaMask nor our partners have access to the cryptocurrencies after you purchase or transfer them, meaning you can access your assets immediately without a holding period.

How MetaMask wallet gives you choice when selling crypto

  • Choose your preferred destination for your cash: debit card, credit card, bank transfer, or PayPal account.
  • Select your preferred quote and provider available in your region.
  • Sell crypto using MetaMask Portfolio on desktop or the MetaMask app on mobile.

Buy crypto with MetaMask Extension



Click the Buy & Sell button on MetaMask extension to redirect to MetaMask Portfolio. Once there, connect your MetaMask wallet.

  1. Click Move crypto.
  2. Click Sell.
  3. Select your region, and currency ‚Äî located to the right of your wallet address.
  4. Enter the amount of crypto that you want to sell. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  5. Select the account destination you want. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  6. Select the best real-time quote from our industry-leading providers. You'll be securely redirected to the provider‚Äôs website where you may have to share KYC, then directed back to MetaMask Portfolio once you accept the quote.
  7. Return to MetaMask Portfolio and click Send ETH.
  8. Click Confirm to complete the transaction in your MetaMask wallet.

Note: You can click on Sell to keep track of your order as it is processed. Times may vary depending on provider.

Success! ü¶ä

Buy crypto with MetaMask app



  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask app.
  2. Tap on the menu button‚Äö which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  3. Tap Sell.
  4. Select your region and currency‚Äîthis is located to the right of your wallet address.
  5. Enter the crypto amount you want to sell. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  6. Tap Send your cash to and select the account destination you want. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal. Availability will depend on your region.
  7. Tap Get quotes to proceed.
  8. Select the best quote from our industry-leading providers. You'll be securely redirected to the provider‚Äôs portal, where you may have to share KYC, then directed back to MetaMask app once you accept the quote.
  9. Review the order summary in your MetaMask app, and tap Confirm to complete the transaction.

Note: You can tap on progress notification to keep track of your order as it is processed. Times may vary depending on provider.

Success! ü¶ä

**Ready to get started? If you‚Äôre on a desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you‚Äôre on mobile, download the MetaMask app in the Apple Store or Google Store.

Need more help? We got you. Head to MetaMask Support to speak with our team of experts around-the-clock.

nodes.metaDescription: Sell crypto for cash directly to your debit card, credit card, PayPal, or bank account with MetaMask wallet.

nodes.title: Transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available in MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

image.title: Centralized exchange transfers MetaMask now available
image.description: Centralized exchange transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available on MetaMask.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio now supports centralized exchange (CEX) transfers from Coinbase and Binance, streamlining the process of transferring assets to your crypto wallet.

Many web3 users have digital assets divided across multiple wallets and accounts, creating a fragmented experience. Moving assets from one platform to another can be overly complicated and involve many steps‚Äîfraught with the risks of copying and pasting addresses incorrectly, and potential security concerns. MetaMask‚Äôs new CEX transfer feature is a solution to this issue, making your wallet more powerful, while also strengthening security.

Instant transfer of assets from centralized exchanges into your MetaMask wallet

MetaMask CEX transfers allow you to immediately move assets between accounts, eliminating the need for manually entering addresses. And, if you have bank accounts linked to your Coinbase or Binance accounts, purchasing crypto directly with your bank account to your MetaMask wallet has never been easier. No additional KYC necessary.

In April 2024, MetaMask partnered with Meld and Mesh to launch a feature that allowed users to track external CEX balances by linking Coinbase or Binance accounts directly from the MetaMask Portfolio dashboard. Now, you can view CEX balances, and also transfer assets from these exchanges into your MetaMask wallet. Neither MetaMask, nor our partners in this integration, will ever have access to your exchange login credentials, or share your wallet addresses with third parties.

CEX transfers will initially support Coinbase or Binance accounts, with expansion to additional exchanges on the horizon. No fees will be charged when transferring digital assets from exchanges to MetaMask. A nominal transaction fee of 0.25% will be applied when transferring from MetaMask to centralized exchanges. Network gas fees also apply.

By bridging the gap between self-custodial and centralized platforms, MetaMask is paving the way for a more powerful, integrated, and user-friendly DeFi ecosystem. Head to MetaMask Portfolio today to get started with CEX transfers.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

nodes.title: How gamers are empowered in web3
nodes.subtitle: Discover the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo
image.description: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo gaming

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. The More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across web3. For Yooldo ‚Äì a gaming community focused on security and autonomy ‚Äì¬†MetaMask is essential.

A new era of web3 gaming

In traditional online gaming, players' assets are controlled by the developer or publisher, and stored on centralized servers. This setup leaves users at risk of losing access to their digital items, which can happen for various reasons including a company modifying its policies, or shutting down the game. In web3 gaming, players have full ownership of their digital assets, independent of the game itself. This decentralization ensures that Yooldo gamers have complete control over their assets, with no monolithic authority able to restrict access or manipulate users‚Äô holdings.

How MetaMask keeps gaming assets safe

With self-custody comes gamers' responsibility for maintaining safety of their own assets. The decentralized security that MetaMask offers is vital for Yooldo gamers. Users have control over their private keys, which means that even in the case of a data breach, gaming assets will remain secure. All actions on Yooldo are also transparent and traceable ‚Äì whether purchasing an in-game asset, or interacting with the platform. And, each transaction requires user approval, via blockchain‚Äôs cryptographic validation and consensus protocols.

Another critical feature that safeguards users is phishing protection, powered by MetaMask and ChainPatrol‚Äôs Eth-Phishing-Protect. MetaMask provides in-app warnings, and domain verification systems to protect users from dubious links and attacks. This allows Yooldo gamers to be alerted to potentially malicious websites quickly and efficiently.

Empowering gamers through decentralization

As the web3 ecosystem grows, security is of the utmost importance. Gamers can store, buy, sell, and trade their in-game assets directly, without worrying about data breaches, server failures, or third-party interference. More broadly, MetaMask enables players to transfer assets between different games, or wider marketplaces. Digital gaming assets earned in Yooldo can be sold or traded for tokens with real-world value, extending their utility beyond gameplay. No matter where you are in your web3 gaming journey, MetaMask continues to offer more ways to stay secure.

Ready to dive into web3 gaming? Head to Yooldo to get started.
